scriptures.content: So Israel took his journey with all that he had and came to <crossref let="g" cid="c01046001.1"/>Beersheba, and offered sacrifices <crossref let="h" cid="c01046001.2"/>to the God of his father Isaac.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: And God spoke to Israel <crossref let="i" cid="c01046002.1"/>in visions of the night and said, "Jacob, Jacob. " And he said, "Here am I. "
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: Then he said, "I am God, <crossref let="j" cid="c01046003.1"/>the God of your father. Do not be afraid to go down to Egypt, for there I will <crossref let="k" cid="c01046003.2"/>make you into a great nation.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: I myself will go down with you to Egypt, and I will also <crossref let="l" cid="c01046004.1"/>bring you up again, and <crossref let="m" cid="c01046004.2"/>Joseph's hand shall close your eyes. "
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: Then Jacob set out from Beersheba. The sons of Israel carried Jacob their father, their little ones, and their wives, in the wagons <crossref let="n" cid="c01046005.1"/>that Pharaoh had sent to carry him.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: They also took their livestock and their goods, which they had gained in the land of Canaan, and <crossref let="o" cid="c01046006.1"/>came into Egypt, Jacob and all his offspring with him,
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: his sons, and his sons' sons with him, his daughters, and his sons' daughters. All his offspring he brought with him into Egypt.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: <crossref let="p" cid="c01046008.1"/>Now <crossref let="q" cid="c01046008.2"/>these are the names of the descendants of Israel, who came into Egypt, Jacob and his sons. <crossref let="r" cid="c01046008.3"/>Reuben, Jacob's firstborn,
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: and the sons of Reuben: Hanoch, Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: The sons of Simeon: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zohar, and Shaul, the son of a Canaanite woman.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: The sons of <crossref let="s" cid="c01046011.1"/>Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: The sons of <crossref let="t" cid="c01046012.1"/>Judah: Er, Onan, Shelah, Perez, and Zerah (but <crossref let="u" cid="c01046012.2"/>Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan); and the sons of <crossref let="v" cid="c01046012.3"/>Perez were Hezron and Hamul.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: <crossref let="w" cid="c01046013.1"/>The sons of Issachar: Tola, Puvah, Yob, and Shimron.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: The sons of Zebulun: Sered, Elon, and Jahleel.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: These are the sons of Leah, <crossref let="x" cid="c01046015.1"/>whom she bore to Jacob in Paddan-aram, together with his daughter Dinah; altogether his sons and his daughters numbered thirty-three.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: The sons of Gad: Ziphion, Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arodi, and Areli.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: <crossref let="y" cid="c01046017.1"/>The sons of Asher: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah, with Serah their sister. And the sons of Beriah: Heber and Malchiel.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: <crossref let="z" cid="c01046018.1"/>These are the sons of Zilpah, <crossref let="a" cid="c01046018.2"/>whom Laban gave to Leah his daughter; and these she bore to Jacob - sixteen persons.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: The sons of Rachel, Jacob's wife: Joseph and Benjamin.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: And <crossref let="b" cid="c01046020.1"/>to Joseph in the land of Egypt were born Manasseh and Ephraim, whom Asenath, the daughter of Potiphera the priest of <crossref let="c" cid="c01046020.2"/>On, bore to him.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: And <crossref let="d" cid="c01046021.1"/>the sons of Benjamin: Bela, Becher, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim, and Ard.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: These are the sons of Rachel, who were born to Jacob - fourteen persons in all.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: The sons of Dan: Hushim.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: <crossref let="e" cid="c01046024.1"/>The sons of Naphtali: Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer, and Shillem.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: <crossref let="f" cid="c01046025.1"/>These are the sons of Bilhah, <crossref let="g" cid="c01046025.2"/>whom Laban gave to Rachel his daughter, and these she bore to Jacob - seven persons in all.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: All the persons belonging to Jacob who came into Egypt, who were his own descendants, not including Jacob's sons' wives, were sixty-six persons in all.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: And the sons of Joseph, who were born to him in Egypt, were two. <crossref let="h" cid="c01046027.1"/>All the persons of the house of Jacob who came into Egypt were seventy.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Brings His Family to Egypt

scriptures.content: He had sent Judah ahead of him to Joseph to show the way before him in Goshen, and they came <crossref let="i" cid="c01046028.1"/>into the land of Goshen.
scriptures.section_title: Jacob and Joseph Reunited

scriptures.content: Then Joseph prepared his chariot and went up to meet Israel his father in Goshen. He presented himself to him and <crossref let="j" cid="c01046029.1"/>fell on his neck and wept on his neck a good while.
scriptures.section_title: Jacob and Joseph Reunited

scriptures.content: Israel said to Joseph, <crossref let="k" cid="c01046030.1"/>"Now let me die, since I have seen your face and know that you are still alive. "
scriptures.section_title: Jacob and Joseph Reunited

scriptures.content: Joseph said to his brothers and to his father's household, <crossref let="l" cid="c01046031.1"/>"I will go up and tell Pharaoh and will say to him, 'My brothers and my father's household, who were in the land of Canaan, have come to me.
scriptures.section_title: Jacob and Joseph Reunited

scriptures.content: <crossref let="m" cid="c01046032.1"/>And the men are shepherds, for they have been keepers of livestock, and they have brought their flocks and their herds and all that they have. '
scriptures.section_title: Jacob and Joseph Reunited

scriptures.content: When Pharaoh calls you and says, <crossref let="m" cid="c01046033.1"/>'What is your occupation?'
scriptures.section_title: Jacob and Joseph Reunited

scriptures.content: you shall say, <crossref let="m" cid="c01046034.1"/>'Your servants have been keepers of livestock <crossref let="n" cid="c01046034.2"/>from our youth even until now, both we and our fathers,' in order that you may dwell <crossref let="o" cid="c01046034.3"/>in the land of Goshen, for every shepherd is <crossref let="p" cid="c01046034.4"/>an abomination to the Egyptians. "<end-chapter/>
scriptures.section_title: Jacob and Joseph Reunited
